Format: Code Values: → NW - New Order: External prescription number assigned by the pharmacy system. If both this field and RXE-15 are populated, the value must be the same. Note: An external prescription number is required in either ORC-3 or RXE-15.

This field can be processed differently based on interface configuration.  Components used:  → Start date  → End date  → Priority → Condition  Example: ^^^20160514^20160614^ROUTINE^PRN  Condition used for non-numeric refill information (i.e. PRN) Example: ^^^20160514^20160614^ROUTINE^PRN  Note: Either ORC-7 or RXE-1 is required.
Format: <ID>^^^^^^^^<Assigning authority>^^^^<ID type>  Alternate format: <ID number>^<Last name>^<First name>^<Middle initial>
